commandsHelp: Usa "/commands" per estendere la lista dei comandi eseguibili in chat.

autorespond.disable: Disattiva la Risposta automatica in chat durante l'assenza
autorespond.nextIn: La prossima Risposta automatica per assenza sarà inviata tra %1
autorespond.next: Risposta automatica per assenza nella prossima menzione

descriptions.automute: register currently playing song to automatically mute on future plays
descriptions.unmute: Reimposta il volume al livello precedente
descriptions.nextsong: Visualizza la prossima canzone nella playlist e se è presente nella cronologia
descriptions.alertson: play sound whenever defined words are written in chat
descriptions.alertsoff: stop playing sound when defined words are written in chat
descriptions.grab: add current song to your selected playlist
descriptions.getpos: Mostra la posizione attuale nella lista d'attesa
descriptions.link: paste link to plugCubed website in chat
descriptions.lockskip: locks DJ booth, skip and unlocks afterwards
descriptions.add: adds targeted user to dj booth/waitlist
descriptions.remove: removes targeted user from dj booth/waitlist
descriptions.whois all: gives userid and username of all users in the room
descriptions.banall: bans all users in the room

responses.alertson: Playing sound on the following words: %1
responses.alertsoff: No longer playing sound on specific words
responses.nextsong: Your next queued song is %1 by %2
responses.isHistory: Warning: This song is still in the history (%1 of %2)

automute.registered: %1 registered to automute on future plays.

eta.boothAvailable: If you join the waitlist now, you would be DJing!
eta.waitListTime: You are in the waitlist %1 of %2, you will be DJing in about %3!
eta.joinTime: If you join the waitlist now, you would be DJing in about %1!

message.historySkipped: Song is in history (%1 of %2), but was skipped on the last play

roomSpecificSettings.infoHeader: This room is using special settings
roomSpecificSettings.infoHeaderCredits: This room is using special settings by %1
roomSpecificSettings.infoDisable: You can disable them in the menu

error.noLiteSupport: This is not supported in plug³ Lite
error.canNotFindTheLastPMReceiver: Can not find the last PM receiver
